title: Samy Bengio - Wikipedia
snippet: Bengio is senior director of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Research at Apple and an adjunct professor at École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne. He was a longtime scientist at Google, where he led a large group of researchers working in machine learning, including adversarial ...

title: Ex-Google AI Scientist Samy Bengio Finds Job at Apple
snippet: Google's former AI scientist Samy Bengio finds a new job at Apple after leaving the search engine giant over ethics concern.

title: Apple hires ex-Google AI scientist who resigned after colleagues' firings | Reuters
snippet: Apple Inc (AAPL.O) said on Monday it has hired former distinguished Google (GOOGL.O) scientist Samy Bengio, who left the search giant amid turmoil in its artificial intelligence research department.

title: r/MachineLearning on Reddit: [D] Samy Bengio resigns from Google
snippet: 358 votes, 142 comments. Source: Bloomberg ( archive.fo link ) (N.B. Samy ≠ Yoshua Bengio, they are brothers). He co-founded Google Brain, and…

title: Research manager resigns amid Google AI ethics controversy | TechTarget
snippet: Samy Bengio, who previously oversaw Google's AI ethics group, resigned amid ongoing rifts between Google executives and AI researchers.
